    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main function
        Parameters:
        args - Command line arguments - call with empty array to print usage help to stdout

      • run

        public void run(java.lang.String sourceFilename,
                java.lang.String targetFilename,
                boolean json,
                boolean altoOutput,
                java.lang.String negCoordsMode)
        Runs the conversion
        Parameters:
        sourceFilename - File path of input PAGE XML
        targetFilename - File path to output PAGE XML
        json - JSON input?
        altoOutput - ALTO XML output instead of PAGE?

      • runTextFilter

        public static void runTextFilter(org.primaresearch.shared.variable.VariableMap textFilterRules,
                                 org.primaresearch.dla.page.Page page)
        Applies a set of filter rules to all text elements of the given page. The type of the target object (region, line, word, glyph) can be specified per rule.
        Parameters:
        textFilterRules - A collection of String variables, each containing a filter rule in the variable value.
        page - Page object with text elements to apply the filter to.

      • setGtsId

        public void setGtsId(java.lang.String pattern,
                     java.lang.String filepath)
        Sets the GtsId that is to be added to the PAGE document.
        Note: The ID has to be conform to the XML ID convention (start with letter, ...).
        Parameters:
        pattern - A specific ID or [start,end], where 'start' is the index of the first character and 'end' the index of the last character within the given filename (index starts with 0).
        filepath - Required if the ID is to be extracted.

      • setTargetSchema

        public void setTargetSchema(java.lang.String versionString)
        Sets the target PAGE XML schema version of the output file.
        Parameters:
        versionString - LATEST, 2013-07-15 or 2010-03-19

      • setTextFilterRules

        public void setTextFilterRules(org.primaresearch.shared.variable.VariableMap textFilterRules)
        Sets the filter rules that are to be applied to all text regions.
        Parameters:
        textFilterRules - A collection of String variables, each containing a filter rule in the variable value.

        Handle negative coordinates of any object with polygon.
